item.title: Video filmed by ICE agent who shot Minneapolis woman emerges
item.description: The clip shows the chaotic moments before gunfire rang out on a Minneapolis street.

item.title: X could face UK ban over deepfakes, minister says
item.description: It comes after government urged Ofcom to use all its powers – up to and including an effective ban – against X.

item.title: EU reaches South America trade deal after 25 years of talks
item.description: Some farmers in Europe opposed the deal, but the EU Commission said it had listened to their concerns.

item.title: Solskjaer set for face-to-face talks with Man Utd chiefs
item.description: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is set for face-to-face talks with Manchester United chiefs about becoming the club's interim boss.

item.title: Man admits racist abuse of footballer Jess Carter
item.description: Nigel Dewale made derogatory comments about the Lioness star's skin colour.
